mapper.select: SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD AS dayPriceDd /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE AS dayPriceMinPrice /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM AS saleEndTm /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.REC_STAT = #{recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* #### SQL Body [[ ################# */ SELECT EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD AS dayPriceDd /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD AS faclCd /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD AS grpFaclCd /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AS dayPriceLogSeq /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE AS dayPriceMinPrice /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.SALE_END_TM AS saleEndTm /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ ,EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG /* CACHE 당일특가 로그 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_FACL /* 맵핑 시설 */ ,EZC_FACL /* 시설 정보 */ ,EZC_AREA_CD /* 지역 코드 */ ,EZC_CITY_CD /* 도시 코드 */ ,EZC_PARTNER /* 제휴사 정보 */ ,EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL /* 맵핑 그룹 시설 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD = EZC_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_FACL.AREA_CD = EZC_AREA_CD.AREA_CD AND EZC_AREA_CD.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.CITY_CD = EZC_CITY_CD.CITY_CD AND EZC_FACL.PARTNER_CD = EZC_PARTNER.PARTNER_CD AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.GRP_FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = EZC_MAPPING_FACL.FACL_CD AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE_LOG.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_AREA_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_CITY_CD.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_PARTNER.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */ AND EZC_MAPPING_GRP_FACL.REC_STAT = #{param.recStat, jdbcType=CHAR} /* 레코드 상태, CHAR(1) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD = #{param.dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.FACL_CD = #{param.faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.GRP_FACL_CD = #{param.grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{param.dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE.DAY_PRICE_DD DESC /* #### SQL Body ]] ################# */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{param.pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{param.pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE SET /* CACHE 당일특가 */ DAY_PRICE_MIN_PRICE = #{dayPriceMinPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 당일특가 최저가, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,SALE_END_TM = #{saleEndTm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 판매 종료 시분, VARCHAR2(4) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_CACHE_DAY_PRICE /* CACHE 당일특가 */ WHERE 1=1 AND DAY_PRICE_DD = #{dayPriceDd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 당일특가 일자, VARCHAR2(8) */ AND FACL_CD = #{faclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND GRP_FACL_CD = #{grpFaclCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 그룹 시설 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ AND DAY_PRICE_LOG_SEQ = #{dayPriceLogSeq, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 당일특가 로그 일련번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
